tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
quoteText: All parties shall observe the respectively applicable data privacy provisions, particularly those that apply in Germany and shall obligate those persons assigned in connection with this contract to data secrecy in accordance with ยง 5 Bundesdatenschutzgesetz (BDSG, German Federal Data Protection Act), insofar as these are not already generally obligated in this regard.
